posts.message:
[align=center][img]http://goo.gl/yemsX[/img][/align]

The edition you are currently reading is the [color=#f66058][b]1st special edition[/b][/color]. These special editions will be few and far in-between. To read any older editions of HF News, please go [url=http://goo.gl/pxojJ]here[/url]. 

[align=center][video=youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j6A49nlFs3o[/video][/align]
[align=center][i]We scored an exclusive interview with Omniscient, enjoy![/i][/align]

[b][align=center][color=deepskyblue][size=xx-large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interesting Facts about 11/11/11[/font][/size][/color][/align][/b]

[list][*]It is a full moon for some of those in the United States.
[*]The date only comes around about every hundred years.
[*]The last time 11/11/11 occurred was on November 11, 1911. On that day, temperatures fell a jaw-dropping 60 degrees over the course of a single day, causing blizzards and tornadoes. The storm is referred to as the "Great Blue Norther." On November 11th of 1911, Kansas City experienced a high temperature of of 76 degrees F and a low of 11 degrees - on the same day!
[*]Veterans Day and Remembrance Day
[/list]
posts.subject: [11/11/11] - HF News ~Special Edition~
